title: Shorts: Ex Fuedo Stallaini
subtitle: Shorts: Ex Fuedo Stallaini
summary:
In this short, we take a walk with Loredana. With her husband Roy, she runs Agriturismo Stallaini in the south east of Sicily. They prepare food for the guests all from within walking distance of the mine. Encounter lucid, vivid scents, smells, colours and be present in this ancient place.

This podcast was made by Jo, with Lizzie Ostrom, and was originally published on the Life in Scents, a podcast about smell.

http://www.agriturismostallaini.com/
https://www.acast.com/lifeinscents
